product_name: Moving Comfort Flex Tank Top - Women's
long_description: In a closet full of ho-hum workout tanks, Moving Comfort Flex Tank Top stands out with its eye-catching design and seamless construction that keeps you comfortable during tough workouts. Stretchy, breathable DriLayer(R) fabric wicks moisture away from skin and resists odor. Moving Comfort Flex Tank Top hits at hips, has cross-back straps and features a fitted cut.
short_description: In a closet full of ho-hum workout tanks, Moving Comfort Flex Tank Top stands out with its eye-catching design and seamless construction that keeps you comfortable during tough workouts.
